name: Lab Rat (davidfrankel)
description:
Lab Rat was created by Team Squamous for Ludum Dare 46. The theme was "keep it alive."

Team Squamous:
  • David Frankel (www.davidfrankel.com)
  • Max Lieberman (www.luderacy.com)
OpenGameArt.org music:
  • Lines of Code by Trevor Lentz
  • Dark Rooms & Scary Things by Isaiah658
  • Biological Weapon by Patrick de Arteaga (patrickdearteaga.com)
  • BlueBeat 01 Copyright 2007 ERH (www.freesound.org/people/erh)
Fonts:
  • Munro by Ed Merritt
  • Silkscreen by Jason Kottke

Lab Rat Copyright © 2020, Team Squamous
